options.name: Booksmarts
options.description: Gain +1 Scribing. Additionally, gain +2 to Knowledge Checks when recalling historical events about Architecture, cultures and Famous Figures

options.name: Versed in Magic
options.description: Gain +2 Arcane Mitigation and +2 Psychic Mitigation

options.name: Master of Language
options.description: You learn one Magical and one non-Magical Language.

options.name: Master of Artifacts
options.description: You can attempt to Identify magical effets on an Object with an Arcanum or Academics Check of 12 and by spending 1 Hour studying it. With a 15 or higher, you recall information about any curses that may be associated with the Object.

options.name: Reaction : Student of Magic
options.description: When forced to make a Resistance Check against a Spell or Ability, you make an Arcanum Check instead.
